data.actual_result: Discord records shift+ right shift. And the action recorded is triggered when you only press left shift
data.short_description: Shift + Down arrow (numpad) records Shift + Right shift on keyblinds
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Settings > Keyblinds - Create a new keyblind or use one you already have - Start recording keyblind - Hold shift and the hold down arrow on the numpad with numlock enabled - Release down arrow key.
